mapper.sql:
FROM member a WHERE 1=1
AND DelNy = 0 AND DelNy = 1 AND nm LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND email LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND dob LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND gender_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.seq ,a.nm ,a.id ,a.password ,a.email ,a.dob ,a.reserve ,a.DelNy ,a.email_code ,a.gender_code ,a.memberRegDate ,(select tel from memberTel aa where 1=1 and aa.tel_defaultNy = 1 and a.seq = aa.member_seq) as phonenum
ORDER BY a.seq DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE 1=1 AND id = #{id}

SELECT a.seq ,a.nm ,a.id ,a.password ,a.email ,a.gender_code ,a.email_code ,a.dob ,a.reserve ,a.DelNy ,a.memberRegDate ,(select tel from memberTel aa where 1=1 and aa.tel_defaultNy = 1 and a.seq = aa.member_seq) as phonenum FROM member a WHERE 1=1 AND a.seq = #{seq}
SELECT a.seq ,a.id FROM member a WHERE 1=1 AND a.id = #{id}
SELECT a.seq ,a.id ,a.nm FROM member a WHERE 1=1 AND a.id = #{id} AND a.password = #{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET DelNy = 1 WHERE seq = #{seq }
